trans-unit.source: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.

The GridViewRowPresenter and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter"></xref> class.
Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.
The area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that is used to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.

The typical usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control.
The template binds the Content property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

The following example shows how to bind the Content property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control.

[!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
The object that represents the content of a row.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> dependency property.
To be added.
Determines the area that is required to display the row.
The maximum area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the area that displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
Returns a string representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
A string that shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
